remarks: Lemma for ~ dvgt0 and ~ dvlt0 .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Feb-2015.)
statement:

dvgt0lem.i $e |- ( ( ( ph /\ ( x e. ( A [,] B ) /\ y e. ( A [,] B ) ) ) /\ x < y ) -> ( F ` x ) O ( F ` y ) ) $.
dvgt0lem2 $p |- ( ph -> F Isom < , O ( ( A [,] B ) , ran F ) ) $.
